name: The Wellbeing Foundation
goal:
Education and preventative measures in the field of mental health.
The Foundation takes a psychosocial approach to mental health problems, and aims to provide resources and methods, where possible, to minimise the risk of developing severe psychological distress of any kind.
We also provide online resources to cope with such distress, and plan to develop our website as means of education for the mental health community.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Education, Information Society, Public Health
euInitiatives: Any policies or initiatives by the European Union in the area of mental health.
